page-run-a-node-build-your-own-ram-note-: Ga bayanan kula kan sa kuɗi
Ga bayanan kula kan Raspberry P
page-run-a-node-build-your-own-ssd-note: SSD dole ne ke buƙatar rubuta gudu.
page-run-a-node-build-your-own-nuc: Intel NUC, gen na 7 ko mafi girma
page-run-a-node-build-your-own-connectio: Wanda ba'a buƙata ba, amma yakan kawo saukin wajen tayar da da mafi nacin haɗawa
page-run-a-node-build-your-own-periphera: Saide canza amfani DappNode, ko ssh/saita mara kai
page-run-a-node-build-your-own-software-: Lokacin da ka shirya na'urar ka, zaka iya saukewa da tsarin aiki na DAppNode ta yin amfani da kowace kwamfuta kuma ka shigar a kan shigarwa da SSD ta USB drive.
Domin cikakkiyar kula, mai amfani ayna iya shirya amfani da jerin umarni a matsayin zaɓi.
Kula da matsalar cigaban mu domin cikakken bayani akan damar farawa da sashen abokin ciniki.
page-run-a-node-buy-fully-loaded-descrip: Yi odar filogi da zaɓin wasa daga dillalai na kwarawa mafin saukakawa da dawowa hawa-hawa.
page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-pr: Tabbacin hanya a lokacin da kake da buƙatarta, da barin tantancewa.
page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-1: Node na wani daban na iya zaɓi akan cinikaiya daga adreshin IP na musammanma, ko cinikaiyan da ya shafi asusun ajiya na musamman, don haka yaba da damar dakatar daku daga amfani da hanyar sadarwan yanar gizo a sanda kuke buƙata shi.
page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-2: Don mallakar node domin a tura cinikaiya ga garanti da zaka iya watsa cinikayyan ku zuwa ga sauran hanyoyin sadarwan mutum-zuwa-mutum a kowani lokaci.
page-run-a-node-community-description-1: Dandalin shafin intanet kamar Discord da Reddit gidane ga yawan lamba ne a maginan al'umma wajen son temaka da tambayoyi da zaka iya haɗuwa da su.
page-run-a-node-community-description-2: Kar kaje kai kai kaɗai. In kana da tambaya zai yuwa wani anan ya temaka maka da amsa.
page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-1: Za ka buƙaci wasu na'urar da zaka fara da shi. Amma gudanar da manhajar 'node' zai yu akan kwanfutan mutum, ka na da natsetse mashin zaiyi matukar bunƙasa aikin 'node' din ka alhali yana rage tasirin ta a matakar farkon kwanfutan ka.
page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-2: Lukacin zaɓar na'ura, la'akari da cewa chain zaye dinga girma, kuma dole akwai buƙatar a kula da shi. Karin ra'ayi da za ayi amfani gurin jinkiri na buƙatar kulawa da node.
page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-bu: Mai arha da ƙara daidaito kaɗan na fasaha masu amfanuwa da shi.
Ko, zaɓi OS da aboki cinikin ka.
page-run-a-node-decentralized-preview: Jurewa akan ƙarfafa tsakiya batun gazawa.
page-run-a-node-decentralized-1: Daidaita sabobin cloud zai iya samar da yawan karfin kwanfutan, amma za su samar da manufa ma katsa-jaha ko maharan neman su rushe hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node-decentralized-2: Jurewar hanyar sadarwa akan samar da yawan 'node' cikin yankin wurare daban-daban, yuwa ga yawan mutane wajen sadarwan 'node' dinsu, dogaro akan tsakakkiya wajen raguwan gazawa, mayar da ƙarfin hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node-further-reading-1-link: Ganancewar Ethereum - zan iya gudanar da Cikakken 'Node'
page-run-a-node-further-reading-2-link: Ethereum akan ARM - Fara Jagorar Sauri
page-run-a-node-getting-started-software: A farin lokacin hanyar sadarwa, masu amfani sun so su samu iyawa na amfani da rubutun-umarni soboda su yi aiki da Ethereum node.
Idan wannane ne abun da aka fi so, da ka samu gwaninta, ka sake jiki ka do ba fasahar mu na takardu.
Yanzu muna da DappNode, wanda shine kyauta da] buɗaɗɗen-tushen manhaja da ya bayarwa masu amfanuwa akanmanhaja-kamar kwarewa alhalin gudanar da 'node' ɗin sa.
Cikin ɗan danni kaɗan za ka iya samun 'node' sama da gudanarwa.

DAppNode ya mai dashi da sauƙi ga masu amfanuwa da gudanar da cikakke 'nodes', a haka ma ga P2P sadarwar, wanda babu bukatar tabawan layin-umurni. Wannan ya mai dashi mai sauki ga wanda zai shiga da kera yawan maran-tsakakkiya sadarwa.
page-run-a-node-hero-subtitle: Kasance mai cikakken iko a lkacin taimakawa wajen tsare hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node-install-manually-1: In kai mai yawan amfani da fasaha ne kuma ka yanke shawarar nina naka na'uran, zaka iya sauke manhajar DappNode akan ko wace irin na'ura mai kwal-kwal wa da kuma wanda aka shigar cikin sabon SSD ta hanyar igiyar USB.
page-run-a-node-meta-description: Sai gabatarwa akan me, saboda mene, da yadda za'a iya gudanar Ethereum 'node'.
page-run-a-node-participate-preview: Shi maran tsakiya juyin juya hali na farawane da kai.
page-run-a-node-participate-1: Ta hanyan gudanar da node kana iya zama ɗaya daga cikin tafiya tsarin sarrafawa da ƙarfafawa na dukkan bayanan dake faɗin duniya.
page-run-a-node-participate-2: In ka kasance mai riƙewa, yana kawo daraja ga ETH dinka ta hanyar tallafawa da kawo tsarin hanyar sadarwa, sannan kana da damar magana a nan gaba.
page-run-a-node-privacy-preview: Dakatar da bayar da damar sanin bayananka na sirri ga wani daban.
page-run-a-node-privacy-1: A lokacin da kuke tura cinikaiyanku ta hanyar amfani da node na bayyane, bayananku a sirri na iya samuwa zuwa ga waninku irinsu adireshin IP da adireshin Ethereum da kuka mallaka.
page-run-a-node-privacy-2: Ta hanyar nuna ajiyar walet da yayi daidai da node ɗinku kuna iya amfani da walet na ajiyarku domin sirrantawa da tsare blockchain.
page-run-a-node-privacy-3: Sanna kuma, idan nodes da ke da haɗari suka rarrba cinikin da ba daidai ba, nodes ɗinka zas u dakatar dasu kai tsaye. Kowane cinikaiya ana tantanceshi a cikin na'urarka, don haka karka yarda da kowa.
page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-title: Rubutu a kan Respberry Pi (sarrafawar ARM)
page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-description: Respberry Pis wasu kwamfutoci ne marasa nauyi kuma suna da saukin mallaka, amman suna da iyakan da zasu iya kawo cikas game da tafiyar da aiyukan nodes ɗinka duk da cewa ba'a ba da shawara dakatar dasu ba, wannan zai zama mafi soyuwa da sauki gun aiwatar da node don amfani kai, da mafi karancin 4 - 8 GB na RAM.
page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-note-2-descripti: Koyi yadda ake saita node ta layin umarni kan Respberry pi
page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-note-3-link: Gudanar da node tare da Raspberry Pi
page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-note-3-descripti: Bi nan idan koyarwa kafi buƙata
page-run-a-node-staking-description: Duk da cewa ba dole bane, da node sannan da gudanar da farawa kusa sosai da dakatar da ETH ka don samun kada sannan zai taimaka wajen bada tsaro ga mabambamtan sassan Ethereum.
page-run-a-node-staking-plans-descriptio: Don ƙara nagartan mai tantancewa, mafi ƙarancin 16GB RAM shi aka zaɓa, amman 32 GB yafi, da CPU wanda ya kai darajar 6667+ a cpubenchmark.net. sannan an ƙara zaɓenshi masu ajiyasuna da damar shiga mafi saurin banwidth na yanar gizo, duk da cewa wannan bai zama tilas ba.].
page-run-a-node-staking-plans-ethstaker-: Yadda ake siyayyan na'urar Ethereum mai tantancewa
EthStaker ya shiga cikin cikakkun bayanai a wannan lokaci mai tsayi na musamman
page-run-a-node-sovereignty-preview: Yi tunanin amfani da node kamar matakai na gaba fiye da yadda zaka samu walet na ajiyar Ethereum naka.
page-run-a-node-sovereignty-1: Walet na ajiyar Ethereum na baka damar cikakken kula da sarrafa kadararka na dijital ta hanyar rike lambobin sirrinka na adreshinka, sai dai wa'innan lambobin sirrin basu baka bayanai game da blockchain, irinsu walet na abunda ya rage a ajiiyanka.
page-run-a-node-sovereignty-2: Yadda aka tsara, walet na ajiyar Ethereum na iya riskar node din wani, misili kamar Infura ko Alchemy, a lokacin duba abinda ya saura. Amfani da node ɗinka na baka damar samu taswirar blockchain na Ethereum.
page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-previe: Kar ku bada damar sarrafa aukuwa na fork.
page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-1: A ɗan lokacin fork na chain, idan chain guda biyu suka haɗu da dokoki biyu ma bambamta, amfani da node ɗinku na tabbatar muku daman zaɓen wasu tsare-tsaren dokoki da kuka zaɓa. Wannan ya rage muku zabin ingantashi zuwa sabon samfari da suke iya daukan sabon tsari, kokuma akasin hakkan.
page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-2: Idan kuna amfani da ETH, gudanar da node ɗinka yana ba ku damar zaɓar abokin cinikin ku, don rage haɗarin skewa da amsa buƙatun hanyar sadarwar kan lokaci. Yin wasa tare da wani ɓangare na uku yana rasa ƙuri'ar ku akan wane abokin ciniki kuke tsammanin shine mafi kyawun zaɓi.
page-run-a-node-what-1-text: Wanda aka sani da 'abokin ciniki', wannan manhajar tana sauke kwafin blockchain na Ethereum kuma ta tabbatar da ingancin kowane block, sannan ta ci gaba da sabunta shi tare da sabbin block da hada-hadar kuɗi, kuma tana taimaka wa wasu su sauke da sabunta kwafin nasu.
page-run-a-node-what-2-text: An ƙera Ethereum don gudanar da node akan matsakaicin kwamfutocin masu asusu. Kuna iya amfani da kowace kwamfuta ta sirri, amma yawancin masu amfani sun zaɓi gudanar da kumburin su akan kayan aikin da aka keɓe don kawar da tasirin aikin akan injin su da rage raguwar lokacin node.
page-run-a-node-what-3-text: Gudanar da node na Ethereum na iya zama mai rikitarwa a karon farko, amma kawai aikin ci gaba da gudanar da manhajar abokin ciniki akan kwamfuta yayin da aka haɗa shi da intanet. Yayin layi, node ɗinku kawai zai kasance baya aiki har sai ya dawo kan layi kuma ya sami sabbin canje-canje.
page-run-a-node-who-title: Wane ya kamata ya gudunar da node?
page-run-a-node-who-preview: Kowa! Nodes ba kawai don shaidar-kuɗimasu tantancewa. Kowa na iya gudanar da node- ba kwa buƙatar ETH.
page-run-a-node-who-copy-1: Ba kwa buƙatar kuɗi ETH don gudanar da node. A zahiri, kowane kulli ne akan Ethereum wanda ke ɗaukar masu inganci.
page-run-a-node-who-copy-2: Wataƙila ba za ku sami kyautar kuɗi waɗanda masu tantancewa suke samu ba, amma akwai wasu fa'idodi da yawa na gudanar da kumburi ga kowane mai amfani da Ethereum don yin la'akari da su, gami da keɓantawa, tsaro, rage dogaro ga sabar ɓangare na uku, juriya na ƙididdigewa da ingantaccen kiwon lafiya da rarrabawa. hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node-who-copy-3: Samun node ɗinku yana nufin ba kwa buƙatar amincewa da bayani game da yanayin hanyar sadarwar da wani ɓangare na uku ya bayar.
